history.proof: intros s0 s1 d t H. split. - intros H1. hauto use: union_str inv: term. - intros [H1 | H2]. + hauto use: union_sd inv: term. + hauto use: mpl_compat_sym, union_sd inv: term.

ctx: intros s0 s1 d t H.
exceptions.tactic: apply union_sd with (c:=t) (tl:=nil) in H; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment s0, s1 : state d : preDTA t : term H : mpl_compat s0 s1 H1 : state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) t The term "t" has type "term" while it is expected to have type "N".

ctx: intros s0 s1 d t H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables c, p0, p1.

ctx: intros s0 s1 d t H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros s0 s1 d t H.
exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

ctx: intros s0 s1 d t H.
exceptions.tactic: apply union_str with (c:=t) (tl:=nil) in H; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment s0, s1 : state d : preDTA t : term H : mpl_compat s0 s1 H1 : state_reconnait d s0 t The term "t" has type "term" while it is expected to have type "N".

ctx: intros s0 s1 d t H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros s0 s1 d t H.
exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

ctx: intros s0 s1 d t H.
exceptions.tactic: apply union_str with (s0:=s1) (s1:=s0) (c:=t) (tl:=nil) in H; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment s0, s1 : state d : preDTA t : term H : mpl_compat s0 s1 H2 : state_reconnait d s1 t The term "t" has type "term" while it is expected to have type "N".

original: intros s0 s1 d t H. split. - intros H1. apply union_sd with (c:=t) (tl:=nil) in H; auto. destruct H; auto. - intros [H1 | H2]. + left. apply union_str with (c:=t) (tl:=nil) in H; auto. + right. apply union_str with (s0:=s1) (s1:=s0) (c:=t) (tl:=nil) in H; auto.
